amendment.description: An amendment numbered 74 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit any funds from being made available for the United Nations Relief and Works Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 495).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 495).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
